cu.explanation_en: Setting the global log level to an unknown value 'invalid' will cause the logging system to fail initialization and potentially crash the CU process.

du.explanation_en: Setting the number of transmit antennas to 0 will cause radio unit configuration errors and prevent any uplink/downlink transmission capability.
du.explanation_zh: 將傳輸天線數量設定為 0 會導致無線電單元配置錯誤，並阻止任何上行鏈路/下行鏈路傳輸能力。
